item.title: How Does Tallow Balm Support the Skin Barrier?
item.description: How Does Tallow Balm Support the Skin Barrier? Your skin barrier is your body’s first line of defense against pollution, bacteria, and moisture loss. If it’s compromised, you might experience dryness, irritation, and sensitivity. Tallow balm NZ is one of the best natural ways to restore and protect the skin barrier. 1. Tallow Mimics the Skin’s Natural Lipids ✔ Similar to human sebum → Helps reinforce the skin’s natural defenses.
